name: Tower of Harald
description:
Problem with the zip file?  try the alternate download here https://www.dropbox.com/s/3iqi3bsv4c068qb/Harald-alt.zip?dl=0

Made for the Stareye Atlas game jam, Tower of Harald is SUPPOSED to be an adventure platformer where you control a human and an orc with different abilities to  solve puzzles.

Only the first level works for now., but you can play around in sandbox mode by using the dev tools

WAD to move. Q to switch characters

R to restart a level

Made for Stareye Atlas Game Jam by Alex Eshetu, Doug Hancox, nematic5

Design:

  • Doug Hancox
  • Axel Eshetu

Programming:

  • Axel Eshetu

Art, Story:

  • Doug Hancox

Sound effects and music:

  • nematic5
